message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value to me, I'm proposing a price of $100 for it. I understand its value to you might be around $80, but I hope this offer presents an opportunity for us both to benefit. Looking forward to your response.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was really hoping to get it for a lower price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. I think that's a fair price considering the value I see in the product.
